title: Reclaiming the Armory
description: The Warden-Commander has seen your map. If they are bringing armored Behemoths, the militia needs heavy ballistae. You are tasked with clearing out Armory Vault 3 to recover them.

turns.narrative: The armory is sealed beneath thirty feet of rubble. You must use mining charges to clear the entrance.
turns.consequence_a: The entrance is cleared quickly, but the loud noise attracts Scourge stragglers you must kill.
turns.choice_b: Use alchemical acid to melt the rock silently
turns.consequence_b: It takes an hour, but you enter the vault without attracting attention.

turns.narrative: Inside, the Vault Warden AI believes the Scourge War is still ongoing from 300 years ago. It demands the proper 16-digit officer clearance code.
turns.choice_a: Attempt to slice the mainframe logically
turns.consequence_a: You fail the complex hack. The AI activates the automated defenses.
turns.choice_b: Present the 'Tuned Radio Receiver' to broadcast an override
turns.consequence_b: The old military frequency confuses the AI into a reboot, unlocking the armory.

armory_secured.description: You secured the ballistae for the walls.

armory_damaged.description: You fought the defenses, damaging some ballistae, but securing the rest.

conclusion: You secured the ballistae for the walls.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
